title: ARUF Game Stuck on loading game.
body: Stuck on League Of Legends Icon when game is about to load.  I always have to end task then reconnect for the game to actually load.

replies.body: Hey, it sounds like your client is going into a dormant state and failing to transition from champion select to the game server.  This could be caused by a few network factors so our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help.  I'd especially recommend Configuring DNS and Port Forwarding to help clear up any snags.  I hope that helps!
